data.text: Bulgari Dubai fulfilled every expectation.  From the moment I was picked up from the airport by their car service (prompt and friendly), to the room with the beautiful beach views, clean, beautifully furnished.  The room food service delicious, the vibe of the hotel lively.  A shout out to the hair dresser there as well, just so good.  The level of service and personal care was beyond any expectaion.  Caring, personable, friendly, and genuine.  Mr. Murillo took every extra effort to make sure all my needs were met.  He sent me a very generous Bulgari chocolates box just because!  Truly a memorable stay on every level.  They are paying attention to a level of service that is exceptional. Their beach area is cozy, beautifully appointed, and just gorgeous.
data.title: Best hotel in Dubai

data.text:
Bulgari hotel my best hotel iv went to it
 but today i went to have IFTAR in II cafa the service was poor, and no one assisted us except Mr. Dior and the manager Mrwan. He ignored us what we wanted, and what we need.
& my feed back thats am not happy at all because I didn’t see the attention to help the guest .. 
before last year i came to Yacht club to have the IFTAR it was really the best IFTAR iv have it the best service & the best management
data.title: IFTAR in II cafa

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Fatma M,

We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback regarding your recent Iftar experience with us.

Ensuring top-notch hospitality is our utmost priority, and we sincerely regret any shortcomings in meeting your expectations. The level of service you encountered does not align with the standards our team consistently aims to deliver.

With that in mind, I would like to extend an invitation for you to revisit us for another Iftar experience. This will allow us to demonstrate the true Bulgari Service Level that we are renowned for. I would be delighted to reserve a table for two at your convenience. Please feel free to reach out to me directly to arrange your booking.

It is feedback from esteemed guests like yourself, which motivates the entire team at Bulgari Resort Dubai to strive for excellence.

I hope to remain in touch with you for your next visit and we will ensure your experience will be memorable.

Sincerely,

Amber Dana Ocak
Quality Manager and Executive Assistant 
BVLGARI Resort & Residences Dubai
Telephone: + 971 52 508 8662
owner_response.author: Bulgari Resort Dubai

data.text: This was one exceptional experience!! We loved the cozy, yet lavish atmosphere in Bvlgari yacht club! The view is phenomenal, the staff is highly attentive and well trained, extra points for  Ayoub! Perfectly complimenting the luxury hospitality level! We will return!
data.title: Bvlgari Yacht Club
